pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 ji4 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1

definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

sentences.english: This is Air China cabin crew chief, director of the voice of Kai-Yan.
sentences.chinese: 這是中國國際航空公司客艙部主任乘務長閻開的心聲。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Beijing on AC.
sentences.chinese: 中國國際航空公司來回香港至北京經濟客位機票。

sentences.english: We settled into coach on an Air China non-stop flight to Frankfurt, and I opened a Chinese packet of “Outbound Group Advice, ” which we’d been urged to read carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我們上了一架中國國際航空公司直飛法蘭克福的班機。
